para_sentences.para_0: At this point, you should be able to answer all of the following questions.
para_sentences.para_1: You should now be able to write a recursive function and define a class. You should be able to create and use objects based on classes you've defined.
para_sentences.para_2: If you are unsure of any of these answers, take some time to review the course materials. Feel free to post questions in Piazza or Teams. Next week's lessons will be easier if you have invested in mastering this week's learning outcomes.
para_sentences.para_3: Check the Explorations and Task List in the Lesson 5 - Overview to review learning materials and make sure you have completed all required activities for this week.

ul_0: What are base cases  and why are they important?
What does a class bundle together?
What is the difference between a class and an object?
What syntax do you use to access the data and functions of an object?
